articles.title: Target to give employees bonuses after strong holiday season, extends Covid-related benefits - CNBC
articles.description: Target said it will give $500 bonuses to all hourly workers and $1,000 to $2,000 bonuses to those in leadership roles.
articles.content:
Target said Monday it will spend about $200 million on another round of employee bonuses and extend its coronavirus-related benefits after its strong holiday season.

articles.title: Godiva is closing or selling all of its stores in the United States - CNN
articles.description: Luxury chocolatier Godiva is getting out of the brick and mortar business.
